p: The down-section variations in TOC, Chenopodiaceae/total pollen ratio, and records of typical biomarkers are illustrated in Fig. 2. Within the profile, the carbon number of alkanes ranges from 15 to 33, with odd-to-even predominance. The carbon number of alkanols ranges from 14 to 34, with even-to-odd predominance; peaks of the C 18 n-alkanols dominate the alcohol fractions. The carbon number of fatty acids ranges from 14 to 24, with even-to-odd preference; and the main fractions of the fatty acids are C 16 and C 18.
